name: TweeTree
description:
A tweetcart made for Ludum Dare 46, Keep it alive.

Press Z or O button to send a rain cloud to water your tree. Once the cloud reaches the base of the tree, the tree will grow. You need to send another cloud shortly after the tree grows to keep the tree alive.

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/tweetree
